message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your cut decreases more than mine each round.  Let's settle this quickly. 45/55.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
The clock is ticking, and we both lose with every round.  47/53 is my final offer.
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
This is ridiculous, Alice! We're both losing out. I'm making a final concession. 48/52, take it or leave it.
